ygData.subject: Re: Level 50 options was:RE: Instruments vs. Melee quandry
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I had a L4 ranger get mad at me for saving her from an orc centurion, because now she had to sit and wait for her hp to regenerate, instead of coming back
ygData.messageBody:
On Sat, 18 Sep 1999, Naeeldar wrote:
>
> guards. I really don't think it's necessary to run to the guards you don't
> lose any expierence at levels 1-5 and then when you do it's easyto gain it

I had a L4 ranger get mad at me for saving her from an orc
centurion, because now she had to sit and wait for her hp to
regenerate, instead of coming back at full health in 30
seconds and just looting her corpse before resuming play.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
